author: Mike Rivero
title: These Drugs Are Helping Our Coronavirus Patients
description: A flash of potential good news from the front lines of the coronavirus pandemic: A treatment is showing promise. Doctors in France, South Korea and the U.S. are using an antimalarial drug known as hydroxychloroquine with success. We are physicians treating pa…
